data.title: Donald Trump to strip all funding from State Dept team promoting women's rights around the world - Leaked plan comes as First Daughter Ivanka defends her father's record with women

Jimmy Wales, the founder of online encyclopedia Wikipedia, has launched a website aimed at countering the spread of fake news by bringing together professional journalists and a community of volunteers and supporters to produce news articles

Ivanka Trump has been booed and hissed at by an audience in Berlin after she praised Donald Trump’s stance on women. During her first international outing as a White House advisor, the first daughter argued her father was "a tremendous champion of supporting families”.
The leader of Chechnya reportedly wants to "eliminate" the gay community by Ramadan
A Scottish engineer has been awarded $1m after he revealed that a cruise liner was illegally dumping waste.
The last male northern white rhino on earth has joined the dating app Tinder - as part of fundraising efforts by conservationists to save the species
Plan to legalise and tax cannabis launched in Switzerland
China bans religious names for Muslim babies in Xinjiang. List of banned baby names released amid ongoing crackdown on religion that includes law against veils and beards
Erdoğan guard threatens woman with rape on social media
Japanese government steps up preparations for missile strike from North Korea, publishing emergency measures for the public.
China warns North Korea not to pass 'point of no return'
US nuclear sub heads to South Korea: report
U.S. to slap 20% tariff on Canadian softwood lumber imports
In a significant public health victory, Mexico has succeeded in eliminating a disease which is the leading cause of blindness worldwide.
U.S. military begins moving THAAD missile defense into South Korea site: Yonhap
